column4: OK, i need a lot of help now.. can anyone take some time out to help me get a graphical interface working again?
i ran the command md5sum /etc/X11/xorg.conf | sudo tee /var/lib/x11/xorg.conf.md5sum then did sudo nvidia-glx-config enable .. then restarted X but X will not load up again
Which gfx card do you have?
its a nvidia TNT2 so its a nvidia-glx-legacy card
[Tkb] FIRESIDE: How would you recommend doing a dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and selecting the nvidia driver?
